闥.en: door of an inner room, gate,  # adapted from cc-cedict

霑.en: to moisten, to be infected by, to receive benefit or advantage through a contact, to touch, transliteration for James,  # adapted from cc-cedict

韙.en: correct, right, proper, good, fine,  # adapted from cc-cedict

鯁.en: blunt, fish bones, unyielding, honest, upright, to choke on a fishbone, to have a fish bone stuck in the throat, to accept, to 'swallow' ,  'take' unwillingly, to take the blame for someone else,  # adapted from cc-cedict

𠸑.en: (Cant.) soft, sodden, with some elasticity, used to describe the texture of food,  # adapted from cc-cedict
